name: Basement (itch) (skid)
description:
A simple non interactive* platform test release of monkey2 VR platform.

You can shoot blocks into floor / sky with vive controller triggers.

This is a recent build of my basement project.  The only bad thing about coding Monkey2 VR is head dents from perched HMD. 

Thank you Mark Sibly for monkey2, it rocks!
